casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF DISCIPLINE OF Barry N. FRANK No. D-3055 Supreme Court of the United States. January 13, 2020

Barry N. Frank, of Ridgefield, New Jersey, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
